title: 服务器显示If you wish to use IP forwarding,please enable it in your BungeeCor...
txt_content: 为什么我服务器进去就显示If you wish to use IP forwarding,please enable it in your BungeeCord config as well! 本来是BC端 下的子服，后来我觉得太卡我就取消了BC然而还是打不开。。。

replies.author: EterLzb
replies.txt_content:
使用BungeeCord请确认spigot.yml文件中BungeeCord: false是否改为BungeeCord: true
如果单独使用Spigot请确认是否改为BungeeCord: false
